body.name: WALI Swivel TV Wall Mount for Most 26-55 inch LED TV Flat Panel Screen, Full Motion TV Mount Bracket with Perfect Center Design up to 400x400mm, Weight up to 55lbs (2655LO), Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 8 hrs 4 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Compatibility: Full motion heavy duty wall mount for most 26 to 55 inches flat panel display up to 55lbs, with Mounting Holes: 75x75mm / 100x100mm / 200x100mm / 200x200mm / 400x200mm / 400x400mm.
Fully Adjustable: The -5/+10 degrees tilt, 180 degrees swivel for better-viewing experience. Slim wall plate design makes it possible to mount your TV in the corner.
Space Saving: Places TV just 1.6 inches from the wall to enhance the look of ultra-thin LED TV. Extends up to 15" from the wall for the space saving.
Easy Installation: 8.86” x 2.76” wall plate can be mounted on any vertical wood studs, brick, or concrete wall (Do NOT mount on drywall alone).
Package Includes: 1 x WALI Articulating Wall Mount, Mounting Hardware Kit, User Manual, experienced and friendly US based customer support available to assist 7 days a week.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got this for my daughter's TV
reviews.reviewText: Your customizing our daughter's bedroom this TV wall mount works great and it has all the nuts and bolts can't beat the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertized
reviews.reviewText: Because the wall this unit is mounted on has studs at 24" I had to use an alternate mounting configuration. It required some boards ( not supplied) and took longer but it was in the instruction manual and worked as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s sturdy for a 43” Samsung 7000 BUT.
reviews.reviewText: It’s sturdy, but you get what you pay for. The included screws for the back of the tv were too long so I went to the hardware store for new ones. No big deal. BUT, when I returned I learned that the screws and washers to secure the tv side and wall side of the mount together we’re non-existent so I could hang the tv on the mount but couldn’t secure it at the bottom without another trip to the hardware store. The plate is threaded so I had to disassemble and bring it with. $3 in hardware but still… the mount is fine. Quality control not so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great TV Wall Mount
reviews.reviewText: Easy to instal and easy to adjust once tv is mounted. Mounted a 46 in TV with it. works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't, if you value your TV more than this mount,.
reviews.reviewText: "Please read entire instruction manual before you start installation and assembly. If you have any questions regarding the instructions or warnings, please contact your local distributor". And that's pretty much the entire text of the assembly instructions. The rest is microscopic pictographs which tell you you'll also need a fence post with slat, a pencil, a drill with a phillips head bit, a Covid-19 test strip, and a disposable Kodak 110 camera from the 1980's.These brackets may be made in the USA, but the instruction manuals were outsourced to some other planet who's inhabitants have extremely sharp vision and communicate VIA rebus.If you have anything but 200x200, 300x300, 400x400, you're left trying to figure out how to attach the extender arms which do not lock into place at the correct angles and who's tabs just bend to fit (if you even have them at the right angles AND in the right holes to begin with). Fortunately, I was able to use the the 200x200 holes - no extension arms necessary (pfffft!!!). But If you have 400x200 or 400x300 or any odd numbered pattern, you'll need to contact that that other planet as to how to attach the arms AND use the supplied holes to mount TV at the same time, as there are NO LOCAL DISTRIBUTORS to help you with jack (nor warranty info or limitations included).Immediately after installation the hollow vertical support arm connected to my 27-pound 50" TV (product advertises up to 55" and 77 pounds) started buckling and the TV started to droop to the ground (which was 5 feet away). It was race to try and save my TV since I had already removed the supports that had held up the TV during installation. Couldn't remove the mount from the TV fast enough and busted my back trying to hold the TV from the front and and unscrew the mount at the back at the same time. Still can't move today.If you want a lot of head scratching, frustration, and a big dose of pain and suffering along with lost time and effort due to false advertising, these products are just what you need!

reviews.reviewText: easy to put together and mount to wall. holds a 55" tv .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great // Mounting Tip
reviews.reviewText: I recommend drilling holes before call and then drill in the screws.. then after they strip use the wrench to finish the job.

reviews.reviewTitle: No apto para mí pantalla de 50"
reviews.reviewText: Supuestamente aceptaba pantallas de hasta 55" pero la mía de 50" no se adaptó con ninguna extensión
Easy to install and adjust , love watching Baywatch on tv now

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente soporte para smart TV JVC 50"
reviews.reviewText: El soporte superó mis espectativas, instalé una smart tv de 50 pulgadas con mucha facilidad, trae un instructivo de instalación bastante detallado y bien elaborado, excelente servicio. Todo el herramental qué viene en el paquete es más que suficiente para poder instalarla sin problema. Para la instalación yo utilice una broca de 5/16 de pulgada y al ranurar hice los hoyos con un grado ligero de inclinación descendente para dejar bien fijado el soporte. El soporte trae diferentes medidas muy adaptables a la mayoría de smarts tv. Chulada de producto, recomendado full.

reviews.reviewTitle: Producto de buena calidad y resistente.
reviews.reviewText: Me encanto muy buen producto resistente de buena calidad yo la puse para una pantalla TCL 55 pulg.
Justo lo que buscaba, excelente producto
